/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the setting sun. Bare trees line the street, their leafless branches reaching upwards towards the clear blue sky. Overhead, power lines crisscross, forming an intricate web against the backdrop of the sky. The sun is in the process of setting, casting long shadows and bathing everything in a warm, golden light. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene.
